typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	julianfilename as string
}
source(output(
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcPlaceHolder
source(output(
		juliandate as integer,
		universaldate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from t_date_lkup',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
Filter1 derive(JulianDatePortionDerived = replace(substring($julianfilename,  instr($julianfilename,toString(year(toDate(currentTimestamp()))))+4),'.csv',''),
		SourceFileNameDerived = $julianfilename) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source1 lookup(toInteger(JulianDatePortionDerived) == juliandate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(juliandate, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		SourceFileName = SourceFileNameDerived,
		universaldatederived
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SrcPlaceHolder keyGenerate(output(SurrogateKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 filter(SurrogateKey==1) ~> Filter1
Lookup1 derive(universaldatederived = universaldate) ~> DerivedColumn2
Select1 sink(input(
		sourcefilename as string,
		destinationfoldername as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table t_stg_datecnv'],
	mapColumn(
		sourcefilename = SourceFileName,
		destinationfoldername = universaldatederived
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
